title: Quarkus 1.13.2.Final released - Oracle JDBC driver extension, bugfixes
content: We just released 1.13.2.Final, a new maintenance release for the 1.13 release train. As usual, this release fixes bugs and includes some documentation improvements but it also introduces a new extension for the Oracle JDBC driver. 1.13.2.Final is a safe upgrade for everyone using Quarkus 1.13. If you are not...
